alert.note: Alert for San Juan; Toa Alta; Toa Baja; Trujillo Alto (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 04 at 4:51PM AST until February 04 at 6:30PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Bayamon, Carolina, Catano, Guaynabo, Loiza, San Juan, Toa Alta, Toa Baja and Trujillo Alto. * WHEN...Until 800 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 450 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen, and small streams are running high. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: San Juan; Toa Alta; Toa Baja; Trujillo Alto
